ComicInfo.Summary: The New Hulk!: The funeral for a fallen Hulkbuster is held and there is tension between Banner's party and his old allies. Zzzax is brought to Gamma Base. Banner is kept under observation by Samson and SHIELD, fearing he will revert to the Hulk once again. When the Hulk appears to bust out of Gamma Base, SHIELD gives chase and finds Banner at the end of the line, but they also find a new Hulk who grabs Banner and takes off.
